name: ofront
body:
### Welcome to ofront
ofront is an Oberon-2 to C translator written in Oberon-2. It supports both ANSI and K&R style C and supports cross translation to arbitrary target platforms. ofront includes a runtime system including an automatic garbage collector for Linux, the Oberon V4 system, and a set of command-line tools.

### Download
Download ofront 1.3 for Linux/i386 from [http://www.software-templ.com/shareware.html](http://www.software-templ.com/shareware.html).

### History
This GitHub repository has been automatically exported from code.google.com/p/ofront
on 2015-10-06. It replaces the previously used google-code ofront repository, which has been
set to read-only mode by google.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
